Put your best foot forward
with a website created just for you

In todays world your website can be the first impression with a client. With our developers and designers working closely we deliver high quality websites in an effecient timeline.

At Nexal, Inc., the client is our main focus. Understanding your business and developing the perfect landscape for your consumers is our goal every day. Through a comprehensive evaluation at the start of any development project, we show you where your strengths are, and how we can make you stronger in other areas to increase your effectivity in selling what you are passionate about.

Our Wide Range of Services and Options for your Site.

We strive to meet your needs, whether that is a pushed timeline or custom design details. Our reaserch and attention to detail will give your website the edge, regardless of the market.

  • Fully Customizable Design

    Using the Jekyll System, we have full visibilty to every inch of your site, allowing every detail to cater to your needs.

  • Research Based Consulting

    Through research and analytics we find the elements that give your site an advantage over others in your market, and show you how to utilize them properly.

  • Built-In CMS

    Content Management made simple using a targeted CMS named Siteleaf, gives you the power to change content quickly and effeciently with little to no experinece in web management.

  • Ongoing Development

    We dont just like to leave our clients stranded after we complete a project, and we will continue to improve site features over time, keeping you presence fresh and releveant.

  • Mobile Responsive Pages

    55.79% of people browse on their phones in todays world, but don't worry, we'll make sure your website captures everyones attention regardless of it's on the way home or at their desk.

  • CRM Management

    Tracking leads with your clients can be a challenging task, and we like to make that easy for you. Most CRMs can be integrated into our builds, so you have the Content Management System that best fits your needs.

Ready to Take the Next Step?

Lets start laying out the plans for your perfect site today.
